title: Is it permissible to work in a warehouse where some products are sex toys & condoms? assim al hakeem
transcript: waikato is it permissible to for someone to work in a warehouse that is owned by a pharmaceutical company where we have to pick up products and put it in two boxes the vast majority of the products are medicine but there are some that are sex toys and condoms is it permit okay I understand your question and the answer is yes it is permissible inshaallah to work in such a warehouse because condoms and sex toys can be used in halal and can be used in Haram spouses can use it in halal means without any problem so there's nothing wrong in doing that and insha Allah the work is halal
